attributes.action: Bring Call Centres Back to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is all very well these companies are trying to 'save money' my concern is how frustrating it becomes when you are trying to explain something to someone in Bangalore and they do not fully comprehend what it is that you are trying to explain to them! There is a clear language barrier and it is about time that these companies gave us the customer service that we deserve! It is not right that someone in a foreign country should have such easy access to our personal data!
